abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32803245, pmid32804081, pmid32805004, pmid32459529, pmid32691875, pmid32789816, pmid32804192, pmid32812414, pmid32813069, pmid32809211, pmid32716893, pmid32525844, pmid32809207, pmid32790951, pmid32794361, pmid32374815, pmid32754934, pmid32782035, pmid32379854, pmid32749705, pmid32738142, pmid32804279
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.08.24
